GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
media: solo6x10: fix possible memory leak in solo_sysfs_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 49060c0da57a381563e482e331dc9d4c3725b41b, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit dcae5dacbce518513abf7776cb450b7bd95d722b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: solo6x10: fix possible memory leak in solo_sysfs_init()
